General.Name: Empresa Distribuidora Electrica Regional SA
General.Description: Empresa Distribuidora Eléctrica Regional S.A. generates, distributes, and sells electricity in Argentina. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Buenos Aires City, Argentina. Empresa Distribuidora Eléctrica Regional S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Energía Riojana S.A.
